scripts.deploy:aws: aws s3 sync ./site s3://lars-stalder-devops-bucket --delete --region us-east-1 --profile school
scripts.deploy:dry: aws s3 sync ./site s3://lars-stalder-devops-bucket --delete --dryrun --region us-east-1 --profile school
scripts.list:bucket: aws s3 ls s3://lars-stalder-devops-bucket --region us-east-1 --profile school
